jsLib:
var pingdao = [
  "type/1",
  "type/2",
  "type/3",
  "type/4",
  "type/5",
  "type/6"
]

var nianfen = [
  "",
  "2025",
  "2024",
  "2023",
  "2022",
  "2021",
  "2020",
  "2010%2C2019",
  "2000%2C2009",
  "1990%2C1999",
  "1980%2C1989",
  "1970%2C1979",
  "1960%2C1969",
  "1800%2C1959"
]
   
function PING() {	
	v = String(this.source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x =String(v[0]);
 return pingdao[x]
}

function NIAN() {	
	v = String(this.source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x =String(v[1]);
 return nianfen[x]
}

ruleContent.content:
class.video-iframe ratio ratio-21x9 z-1 get-hits@data-play
<js>
java.startBrowser(result,title)
java.toast('正在加载视频\n请耐心等待')
  '【刷新正文】播放\n直链:\n' + result
</js>

ruleExplore.lastChapter: class.position-absolute bottom-0 end-0 px-2 py-1 text-bg-dark bg-opacity-75 rounded m-1 fs-9@text
ruleExplore.name: class.fs-6 my-1 line-2@a@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
all="" //线路个数 len=java.getElements('class.down-title@h2').length for(i=1;i<=len;i++){ //获取线路名称 from=java.getElements('class.down-title@h2')[i-1].text() //获取线路的播放列表 res=java.getElements('class.video_list')[i-1] //把线路名称插入列表里，在更新时间那里显示 res=JSON.stringify(res).replace(/<\/a>/g,'

'+'🎬'+from+'

') all+=JSON.parse(res) } all class.video_list@a
